takeOwnership(uint256).details: 检查 tokenId 被授权者是否符合

transfer(address,uint256).details: 只有僵尸的所有者可以调用

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

approve(address,uint256).notice: owner将僵尸放到 “流动池”, 等待别人来领取, 通过调用 takeOwnership 方法领取; 只有 owner 有权限调用该方法

balanceOf(address).notice: 该 owner 对应的僵尸数量

takeOwnership(uint256).notice: owner来转移僵尸; 先检查僵尸在不在“流动池”里面. 如果在的话, 调用转移方法

transfer(address,uint256).notice: 僵尸转移方法, from -> to; 改方法只有owner有权限调用
